overview:
Michel El Meouchi is a Partner at Seeqnce Ltd., one of the Middle East’s leading startup accelerators.

Prior to joining Seeqnce, Michel had a successful career as a lawyer in Canada, Lebanon and Qatar, working on various corporate and commercial matters in North America and the Middle East, for a number of local, regional and multinational clients.

Michel was a Senior Associate at Badri and Salim El Meouchi Law Firm, where he directed the Qatar office for its first years of operation. He also advised tech companies on their activities and deployment, including most recently advising Vodafone Qatar on various legal and structuring matters.

Michel is active in various Arab civil society initiatives. He volunteered with Injaz Al-Arab, coaching young Qatari women in economics for success and entrepreneurship courses. He has also advised a number of NGOs and charitable organisations in Lebanon.

Michel holds a Bachelor of Civil Law from the University of Montreal, alongside a graduate diploma in North American Common Law. He also holds a Certificate in Chinese Business Law from the China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing, China.

Michel is a member of the Quebec Bar Association and the Law Society of Upper Canada.
